definition[0]: used to agree with someone or to say that you feel the same way
example[0]: ‘We have to talk about it, Rob.’ ‘Yeah, I know.’
definition[1]: used to say that you have suddenly had an idea, thought of a solution to a problem etc
example[1]: I know! Let’s go out for a meal on your birthday.
definition[2]: used to stop someone from interrupting because they have an opinion about what you are saying
example[2]: It sounds silly, I know, but I will explain.
example[3]: I know, I know, I should have had the car checked out before now.
